name: jQuery Drilldown
tagline: A simple jQuery plugin for creating animated drilldown menus.
body:
Features -------- * AMD support * Multiple menus on a single page * Pretty flexible, doesn't enforce specific tags * Lightweight: 1.8 KB when minified (even less after gzip) Demo ---- View it [here](demo.html). Usage ----- ```js var options = {}; $('.drilldown').drilldown(options); ``` Available options ----------------- Shown with their default values: ```javascript { event: 'click', // * View note below selector: 'a', // * View note below speed: 100, cssClass: { container: 'drilldown-container', root: 'drilldown-root', sub: 'drilldown-sub', back: 'drilldown-back' } } ``` \* Note: `selector` and `event` will be used for binding drilldown-initiating action in this manner: ```js $('.drilldown').on(event, selector, function () { /* ... */ }); ``` CSS & HTML ---------- ```css .drilldown { overflow: hidden; } .drilldown-sub { display: none; } ``` ```html
